content:
mypy警告修复记录（2026-01-10）：
1. 修复了jarvis_agent/__init__.py中min_overlap参数错误（应为overlap_threshold）
2. 移除了organize_memories调用中已废弃的min_overlap参数
3. 为local.py的embed_query方法添加了类型转换cast(List[float], ...)
4. 为6个使用requests库的文件添加了# type: ignore注释：
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_utils/http.py
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_utils/quick_config.py
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_tools/read_webpage.py
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_rag/rerankers/jina.py
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_rag/rerankers/edgefn.py
   - src/jarvis/jarvis_rag/embeddings/edgefn.py
5. 在pyproject.toml的dev依赖中添加了types-requests和types-tabulate
6. 在mypy.ini中为相关模块添加了ignore_missing_imports配置
